function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability of outcome variables and incomplete denominators in included studies","Impact":"Inability to conduct robust meta-analyses, potentially leading to unreliable results","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough screening of studies and standardization of outcome variables","Technologies":"Study screening tools and data standardization software","People":"Research analysts, reviewers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Difficulty in identifying precise community transmission rates for meta-regression","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the impact of community transmission on COVID-19 positivity in the workplace","Mitigation":"Use additional data sources or conduct sensitivity analyses to estimate community transmission rates","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, data modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, data analysts","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of statistical power to detect small but meaningful differences between subgroups","Impact":"Risk of not detecting important associations between IPC measures and pooled positivity estimates","Mitigation":"Increase the number of studies included or use alternative statistical methods to account for low statistical power","Technologies":"Statistical power analysis tools, alternative meta-analysis models","People":"Statisticians, meta-analysts","Owner":"Research teams, statistical consulting groups"}]}
